EditCalendar: Edit Calendar, Right Click & Drag to move Calendar
StartStopPseudo: Stop/start pseudo real time clock, Right Click to reset Calendar position.
SeasonIntro: Enter the start date and weather modifiers for each season. The Color dropdown changes the color of the weather icon for a visual indication of the season. Entering an @RollTable[] into the 'Table' will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table. Note this will disable FXMaster integration.
HotterOrColder: Is the season hotter or colder than average?
DrierOrWetter: Is the season drier or wetter than average?
SeasonMonthStart: What month does the season start?
SeasonDayStart: What day does the season start?
SeasonHourBright: Enter the hour it gets bright
SeasonHourDark: Enter the hour it gets dark
SeasonColor: What color do you want to display with the season?
SeasonRolltable: OPTIONAL: Entering a @RollTable[] will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table.
MoonIntro: Enter the cycle length, current cycle percentage, and eclipse information for the moon(s).
MoonLengthDesc: Enter the length of the lunar cycle.
MoonPercentDesc: Enter the current fullness of the moon.
MoonLEclipseDesc: Enter the chance of a Lunar Eclipse on a given night.
MoonSEclipseDesc: Enter the chance of a Solar Eclipse on a given day.
Moon2ChatHelp: If true, any moon phase changes will be output to chat, displayed only to GM level users.
DateReoccuringEvent: Enter the date and description of reoccuring events such as holidays.
EventDayHelp: What day does the event start?
OneTimeDescr: Enter the date and description of one time events, for example an assassination.The event will be deleted after it is triggered.
AddOneTimeEvent: Add a new one time event
AddNewDay: Add a new day of the week
MonthAbbrevHelp: What is displayed instead of the month number if the month is intercalary.
MonthDelHelp: Removes the month from the normal month numbering scheme
Hurricane: Hurricane or large amounts of flooding
ScatteredW: Scattered clouds, but mostly clear today.
SunAshW: The sun is completely obscured by ash, possible ashfall today
OvercastW: Completely overcast with some snow flurries possible.
OvercastLightW: Completely overcast with light freezing rain possible.
LightSnowW: A light to moderate amount of snow today.
LightRainW: Light to moderate freezing rain today.
LargeFreezingRainW: Large amount of freezing rain today.
EarthquakeW: Earthquake, firey rain, and toxic gases today.
AboutTimeMissingHelp: The Calendar/Weather mod requires AboutTime by Tim Posney in order to run properly.
CalDispNonGmHelp: If false, clients without GM-level permissions will not see the calendar displayed
Weather2ChatHelp: If true, the weather will be output to chat, displayed only to GM level users.
Display24HHelp: If true, a 24 hour clock will be used for the time display.
WeatherLabelHelp: When checked, if the FXMaster module is installed, it will generate weather effects such as rain and clouds.
NightCycleLabelHelp: When checked, the scene will undergo a night cycle, darkening during the night and getting brighter during the day.
NoGlobal: Calendar/Weather - Disable Global Illumination at Night.
NoGlobalHelp: When checked, once the scene reaches max darkness, it will disable the scenes' Global Illumination
